titleStmt.title: A copy of Monsieur Peire's certificate, sent by him to Captain Desborow; concerning Monsieur Ponti's five ships appearing off St. John's port in Newfoundland, translated into English from the original, which is ready to be produced.
titleStmt.author: Peire, Monsieur.

titleStmt.title: A copy of Monsieur Peire's certificate, sent by him to Captain Desborow; concerning Monsieur Ponti's five ships appearing off St. John's port in Newfoundland, translated into English from the original, which is ready to be produced.
titleStmt.author: Peire, Monsieur.

notesStmt.note: Signed and dated at end: Dover, 28 Jan. 1698. Peire.
